message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond quickly to secure this opportunity.
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to get this product for closer to my budget.  I'm willing to pay $850,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a counteroffer. I am willing to consider $900,000 for the product, which is still above your initial offer but below mine. I believe this could be a fair compromise for both of us.

Alice, your offer is getting closer, but I'm still a bit away from my target price. I'm willing to go up to $875,000. This is a fair compromise for both of us, and I believe it will allow us to close the deal quickly. Let's see if we can agree.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I am prepared to reconsider at $890,000. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise while still allowing me to maintain a satisfactory profit margin. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
